18 sts round 6 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 3 x3 single_crochet 6 21 sts round 8-11 single_crochet all around 21 sts fasten ob leave a long tail for sewing the arms onto the body stub the arms to attach the arms place them on about 20 stitches from the top of the body top = where you fastened ob to the side of the body you want to place them so the plushie is almost a t-shape and perfect of hugs on demand arms detailing round 1 take bright yellow yarn with 3 0 mm hook surface crochet the second row from where you sewed the arm onto the body all the way around fasten ob round 2 surface crochet the fourth row from the nub of the arm all the way around fasten ob repeat round 1-2 on the other arm shoes make 2 round 1 take tan yarn mc single_crochet 6 in mc 6 sts round 2
